title: the ICE happened when run cargo clippy

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code That's a little hard to find out the minimal reproduce codes but I can give the [project](https://github.com/Sherlock-Holo/rfs) what I am running `cargo clippy` Alos cargo reports codes is ``` --> /home/sherlock/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/tonic-0.4.3/src/client/grpc.rs:154:5 | 154 | / { 155 | | let request = if let Some(interceptor) = &self.interceptor { 156 | | interceptor.call(request)? 157 | | } else { ... | 211 | | Ok(Response::from_http(response)) 212 | | } | |_____^ ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.60.0-nightly (17d29dcdc 2022-01-21) binary: rustc commit-hash: 17d29dcdce9b9e838635eb0adefd9b8b1588410b commit-date: 2022-01-21 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Checking tonic v0.4.3 error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/generator.rs:755:13: Broken MIR: generator contains type http::uri::Parts in MIR, but typeck only knows about {ResumeTy, &mut client::grpc::Grpc, request::Request, C, http::Request, client::grpc::Grpc, >::Future, ()} and [&mut client::grpc::Grpc, request::Request, http::uri::PathAndQuery, C] --> /home/sherlock/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/tonic-0.4.3/src/client/grpc.rs:154:5 | 154 | / { 155 | | let request = if let Some(interceptor) = &self.interceptor { 156 | | interceptor.call(request)? 157 | | } else { ... | 211 | | Ok(Response::from_http(response)) 212 | | } | |_____^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/17d29dcdce9b9e838635eb0adefd9b8b1588410b/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1115:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.60.0-nightly (17d29dcdc 2022-01-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `client::grpc::::streaming::{closure#0}` end of query stack error: could not compile `tonic` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/17d29dcdce9b9e838635eb0adefd9b8b1588410b/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1115:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::span_bug:: 3: ::span_bug:: 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt:: 7: ::run_pass 8: rustc_mir_transform::pass_manager::run_passes 9: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 11: ::optimized_mir 12: ::encode_crate_root 13: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 14: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 15: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 16: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 17: ::ongoing_codegen 18: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 19: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 20: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.60.0-nightly (17d29dcdc 2022-01-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `client::grpc::::streaming::{closure#0}` end of query stack error: could not compile `tonic` ```
